DOC.brief_summary: The investigators have initial evidence that the combination of cetuximab and cisplatin-HDFL may further improve the efficacy of the cisplatin-HDFL combination chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Cetuximab Plus P-HDFL for the First-line Treatment of Advanced Gastric Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The clinical efficacy (confirmed objective response rates, progression-free survival, overall survival), and treatment-related toxicities of this novel regimen will be examined as the first-line treatment in patients with nonresectable or recurrent/metastatic gastric cancer.
